title: TUESDAY 3/30 - Jimmy Garoppolo's future in SF
itunes:title: TUESDAY 3/30 - Jimmy Garoppolo's future in SF
description:
49ers GM John Lynch confirming his team will take a QB with the 3rd overall pick in the upcoming NFL draft, but head coach Kyle Shanahan says Jimmy G is still a part of their future (0:08). The Lions making some big moves in free agency this offseason and new head coach Dan Campbell (1:115) thinks they'll fit in nicely with what he's trying to accomplish in the Motor City. Plus, Saints QB Jameis Winston (2:03) talks about battling it out with Taysom Hill for the starting job in New Orleans

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
